name: Svellsongur
rules_text:
EQUIP (1  , 1 ): Attach this to a unit you control.)
As this is attached to a unit, copy that unit’s text to this Equipment’s effect text for as long as this is attached to it.

params.summary: EQUIP (1  , 1 ): Attach this to a unit you control.)
As this is attached to a unit, copy that unit’s text to this Equipment’s effect text for as long as this is attached to it.

flavor: “Only the greatest Freljord heroes have weapons made of True Ice!” —Nunu
